mapper.select: SELECT BOARD.TITLE, BOARD.IDX, BOARD.CREA_ID, BOARD.HIT_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(BOARD.CREA_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d %I:%i:%s') AS CREA_DTM, USER.NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_comment WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND BOARD_IDX = BOARD.IDX) AS COMMENT_CNT FROM tb_board AS BOARD JOIN tb_user AS USER ON BOARD.CREA_ID = USER.ID WHERE BOARD.DEL_GB = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD.IDX DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}

SELECT BOARD.TITLE, BOARD.IDX, BOARD.CREA_ID, BOARD.HIT_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(BOARD.CREA_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d %I:%i:%s') AS CREA_DTM, USER.NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_comment WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND BOARD_IDX = BOARD.IDX) AS COMMENT_CNT FROM tb_board AS BOARD JOIN tb_user AS USER ON BOARD.CREA_ID = USER.ID WHERE BOARD.DEL_GB = 'N' AND BOARD.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY BOARD.IDX DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}

SELECT BOARD.IDX, BOARD.HIT_CNT, BOARD.CREA_ID, DATE_FORMAT(BOARD.CREA_DTM,'%Y-%m-%d %I:%i:%s') AS CREA_DTM, BOARD.TITLE, BOARD.CONTENTS, USER.NICKNAME FROM tb_board AS BOARD JOIN tb_user AS USER ON BOARD.CREA_ID = USER.ID WHERE BOARD.IDX = #{idx}
SELECT IDX, TITLE FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND IDX < #{idx} ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT IDX, TITLE FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND IDX > #{idx} LIMIT 1
SELECT IDX, TITLE FROM tb_board WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND DEL_GB = 'N' AND IDX < #{idx} ORDER BY IDX DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT IDX, TITLE FROM tb_board WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') AND DEL_GB = 'N' AND IDX > #{idx} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS SEARCH_COUNT FROM tb_board WHERE DEL_GB = 'N' AND TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_board ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_board SET HIT_CNT = ifnull(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{idx}
UPDATE tb_board SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024,1) AS FILE_SIZE FROM tb_file WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{idx} AND DEL_GB = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_file ( BOARD_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{BOARD_IDX}, #{ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME}, #{STORED_FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_SIZE}, #{ID} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_file SET DEL_GB = 'N' WHERE IDX = #{FILE_IDX}
UPDATE tb_file SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{idx}
